keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for Schools and Youth Services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Seek further investment; free public access broadband in Youth Cafes enabling free-call helpline access.
Support plans for new-build council homes and affordable housing.
Oppose nuclear waste repository and encourage investments in wave and tidal energy.
Work with existing local food producers to create jobs for local people.
